```{r}
## Class Notes

word_count <- function(){

scriptures2 <- scriptures %>% 
  filter(volume_short_title %in% volumes) %>% 
  group_by(volume_short_title) %>% 
  summarise(total = sum(str_count(scripture_text, "love")))
}
  
word_count(the_word = "[Ll]ove")



word_count2 <- function(the_word, volumes = c("NT", "BoM")){

scriptures2 <- scriptures %>% 
  filter(volume_short_title %in% volumes) %>% 
  group_by(volume_short_title) %>% 
  summarise(total = sum(str_count(scripture_text, the_word)))
}
  
word_count2(the_word = "[Ll]ove", volumes = c("NT", "BoM"))


word_count3 <- function(the_word, volumes = c("NT", "BoM"), my_groups){
  
  scriptures %>% 
    filter(volume_short_title %in% volumes) %>% 
    group_by({{my_groups}}) %>% 
    summarise(total = sum(str_count(scripture_text, the_word)))
}

word_count3(the_word = "[Ll]ove", my_groups = volume_short_title)
```
